thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com
thread.title: Beth Lebron

author: Beth Lebron
title: Beth Lebron
text: Fast and easy experience. Whole process took roughly an hour even with me already applying online and getting approved. The salesman that helped me was really nice and helpful and explained everything in detail; how they work, etc. They do a slight credit check but pretty much work a deal for you based on your employment. Highly recommend coming here to purchase a vehicle it will be worth it.
